from ums_resource
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ums_resource (code, id, pid, name, url, menu_id, isactive, request, description, type, sort, sys_del, sys_create_user, sys_create_time, sys_modify_user, sys_modify_time) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isactive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{request,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysCreateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sysModifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
